Error load/save File Check Image or SD-Card! Stroke Width Save Changes? Help Move and resize the circle or transform it to an ellipse. Tap to paint the shape on the image Tap on the symbols on the bottom bar to flip the image. Remove parts of the image like with an eraser. Use your finger to move the image around. Tap on the symbols on the bottom bar to zoom in or zoom out. Tap on the symbols on the bottom bar to change the color or the brush size. Tap on the image to select a color. Tap to undo your previous action. Tap to redo an undone action. Tap on the image to fill an area with the selected color. Position the cursor where you want to draw. Tap to activate the cursor. Move your finger to draw. Tap again to deactivate. Use to resize the image. Move and resize the rectangle to cover the area you want to stamp. Tap to select the area. Move and Tap again to stamp. Move and resize the square or transform it to a rectangle. Tap to paint the shape on the image. Import an image from the gallery to the stamp tool. Tap on the buttons to rotate the image left or right. Draw a straight line. Write text and format it. Resize the text box afterwards. Tap to insert the text on the image. Quit Save Changes?
